name: Arabic Webfonts
author: Jozoor

sections.description:
An easy way to add Arabic fonts to any theme without coding using WordPress Customizer.

Arabic Webfonts Site | Jozoor Plugins | Jozoor Themes

An easy way to add Arabic fonts to any theme without coding using WordPress Customizer. This plugin integrates with the WordPress Customizer so you can preview all Arabic fonts on your site in realtime. It’s compatible with any theme.

It also allows you to create custom font controls in the plugin admin page area to control particular css selectors. Once created, these custom font controls are instantly available in the customizer no coding required!

The plugin depend on ” Arabic fonts library ” from: fontface.me

Arabic Webfonts Features

  • An easy way to add Arabic fonts to your site.
  • Control in the font type, size and style for any section in real time.
  • Adding custom font controls for your theme.
  • Reset any section settings or all settings.

Plugin Support

  • Support is currently provided via our Jozoor Support Center. If you have a question or problem, Open a Support Ticket Here and we will help you.
  • Jozoor Support Center

Jozoor Plugins List

  • Shortcode Cleaner :
    Clean your WordPress content from unused broken shortcodes. Watch Demo
  • Arabic Webfonts :
    An easy way to add Arabic fonts to any theme without coding using WordPress Customizer. Watch Demo

Follow us: Twitter – Facebook – Youtube – Dribbble – CodeCanyon
sections.installation:
Installing “Arabic Webfonts” can be done either by searching for “Arabic Webfonts” via the “Plugins > Add New” screen in your WordPress dashboard, or by using the following steps:

  1. Download the plugin via WordPress.org
  2. Upload the ZIP file through the ‘Plugins > Add New > Upload’ screen in your WordPress dashboard
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:

This will help you to add Arabic fonts in your site without coding using WordPress customizer.

1.4

1.3

  • fixed custom controls number which was show latest 5 enough

1.2

  • 2015-4-30
  • start using fontface API to get list of all fonts as JSON

1.1

  • added 3 new fonts
  • fixed font type duplicated
  • change menu position for plugin page

1.0

  • 2015-4-22
